description:
Larson, Larson, & Dauer has a satellite law office in Oxnard, California, where we accept clients by appointment only who have serious and complex legal challenges that affect their lives, their careers and their livelihood.

Having served the greater Los Angeles metro area for more than 40 years now, our law firm has become the trusted source for injured, disabled and aggrieved workers as well as innocent accident victims throughout our community who face legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Workers' compensation
  • Employment law
  • Personal injury

Offering a fresh approach to law, we will not simply accept your case and offer unfounded promises on how much money we can get for you. Instead, we will sit with you and fully analyze your claim to ensure you have a viable case. If so, we will provide the solid advice you need to make the best-informed decisions about how to proceed while giving you a realistic expectation on what you can expect as far as results are concerned.

We employ this approach because we want to ensure that we provide the highest level of advocacy and support to those we serve. Since first opening our doors, we have recovered an astounding $500+ million dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, earning our reputation as one of the leading legal practices in the region for those in need.

If you suffered an injury or loss at work or as the result of someone else's negligence, or if you experienced discrimination or harassment on the job or need help resolving a wage and hour dispute with your employer, you can turn to Larson, Larson, & Dauer for the quality, effective counsel you deserve. To schedule an appointment for a free initial consultation concerning your matter, you can call our law office or visit our website.
